channel.title: Fun PK

item.title: Fun PK
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Hey

I have a Fun PK zone working apart from one thing

When you teleport after dying you keep all of your items but you cant move from that spot,

Here is my current code

[code]if ((absX >= 3280 && absX <= 3340 && absY >= 9340 && absY <= 9400 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

        refreshSkills();
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    updateRequired = true;

        sendMessage("Unlucky you died :D but you keep your stuff :O");
        teleportToX = 2853; //put where u wanna go after you die here
        teleportToY = 3591; //put where u wanna go after you die here

    }
    
    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();
    }

[/code]

Any help would be greatly appreciated

Thanks

Read full topic
